comments.body: Absolutely not! Having a crown in Minecraft makes no sense unless it's a relic and making the wearer fly is an even bigger no. This is considered very overpowered and would basically take away the purpose of the Elytra.
It should just be 7 gold and one emerald to make also it should make mobs freeze when right clicked in hand.
I think it should definitely be as protective as a iron helmet. And if you are wearing it if you hurt a mob then it will die in one hit.

I think the flying bit is a bit over the top, but maybe you could enchant them to give you weak effects like losing hunger slower, and regen 1. Maybe you could put a variety of all gems in the crown, maybe even a diamond crown. Should give 1.5 armour bars

Maybe there could be different types of crowns, all with a gold base and different jewels. Since crowns signify royalty, maybe when wearing one a player has the ability to give commands to villagers? Simple, basic commands, not OP stuff. Like maybe you can take some of their goods for free, or you can put them under "house arrest" for a bit or something.

They should drop straight through water and slowly fall though the ground. You should not take fall damage but if you fall, you should fall through the ground faster. This makes the potion have benefits and repercussions.
Honestly Some Animal I forgot to add in a couple more things to this post. I will do that as soon as possible.

Also, this post reminds me of the https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360041839552-Nether-Biome-The-Soul-Wastes-A-fungal-haunted-wastland-Includes-TONS-of-Content-Textures-and-Models-
Maybe when the effect runs out while you are in a block you can suffocate
Name: Stability?

I look ed up words for stability and such and here and some good ones:

Balance, steadfast, solidarity

Hope this gets added üòÄ
Ayyy! The new netherite armor has reduced knockback!

i think that when placed near water, in about a day the dead bush will sprout leaves and be a harmless version of the berry bush. The whole water thing is similar to how tumble weed resurrects itself when it reaches water
Well I do agree with you that bells should be craftable however I don't agree with you about the recipe. The recipe you suggested is too cheap.
Sorry but there's a reason why a trident is so hard to get.
What is the reason?
The reason is because with the Trident it would be an easier way to transport through water and rain, it's both a melee and long ranged weapon, and it's an easier way to get Charged Creepers.
Do you work for mojang?
I wish.
Its is good

This is literally the Smoker so I don't know why you would put this in as a suggestion! Also what you're saying here is very hard to read.
This is great!

Love the idea and the design! They would match the mood of the fortresses as well as be another cool storage item. The affected to gravity is really an interesting concept since move blocks beside sand, gravel, and anvil arent really gravity oriented
I was going to suggest a shingle block. Perhaps with a straight slope variant?
It should be accessible as a tool block with a menu that allows you to pick which entities you want to trigger it.

@Zachary Strickland

Perhaps you could tap the ender orb with a certain mob drop, the mob drop affecting which mob/mobs it detects? I feel that would be quite a unique and interesting way. Perhaps the orbs eye could change colour depending on what it‚Äôs been set to detect?
I would like to put shields on an armor stand in Java edition.
But it should be a enchantment maybe even a special item you put on your pick or axe that allows it to cut a vein of blocks

Please put this into bedrock I really only play solo and this tool would help build and collect when there is no one to play with I think this would not only help the game but take it to the next level. I think this should be a new tool maybe a sledge hammer that only vein mines ores

I would also really love a vein mining tool. My thought was to require full emerald blocks to make the tools. They would have the same durability as diamond tools but would breakdown all similar blocks in a 3x3x3 area ahead of the target block.
I've thought about this years ago lol.
You can only get one Dragon Egg. This item would ruin the fun for many people on servers and the recipe doesn't make any sense.

The recipe doesn't make any sense, you can't see through a Dragon Egg, and how would this make villages and house? Also the player can't get 3 Dragon Eggs in pure survival. This seems like an item that just can't be in game. I'm sorry man.
You can only get 1 dragon egg per minecraft world.
You can only get 1 dragon egg per minecraft world.
I dont like the crafting recipe, because it should be replaced with something else!

yes pro
I like the idea, where if you eat the "Fugu" you'll get a 10% chance of getting poisoned, maybe you could craft it using carrots and brown mushrooms together in a bowl.
Maybe you could cook pufferfish to remove the toxins, just like cooking chicken will remove the risk of getting the hunger status effect.
I don't know if this is the right place to comment this, but I would like to point out that with all of these soups, it would be nice if there was something that required bamboo shoots.
I want this in any edition in game. I hope this gets approved.
Cool
a camera is a little to modern. minecraft takes place in 1869 or something like that

Actually, Minecraft isn't that old. Remember that there's concrete(including the glazed versions), redstone machines, and more. Also, there is already a camera in the education edition so it would be fair if that was added to java.

unlike boats the armor stand recipe uses sticks so it has a pre made texture of oak but if mojang were to add a wood plank in the recipe this could be how we can make different types of armor stands maybe the new recipe cound replace the center stick with a plank that way we could choose the type of armor stand by choosing different plank
